1.0.name: wordpress/hotelscombined-search
1.0.description: Search and Compare 100+ travel sites for 1000s of Hotel deals worldwide – Hotels Combined With this official Hotels Combined™ widget, you can compare over 100 of the best hotel reservation sites to find the cheapest accommodation deals at any destination. With a database of more than 200,000 hotels from 195 countries, HotelsCombined.com™ is the world’s leading hotel search engine visited by over 6 million people each month.
